name: Maid_hunter
description:
Maid Hunter is a survival survival gun collection game. You can get gold coins to buy guns and skill coins to upgrade skills through mechanical hunting.
Hunt machines to earn gold coins and skill coins to buy upgrades to make you more powerful.


features

▶ 4 mechanical types of enemies.
▶ 5 upgradeable guns.
▶ 3 upgradeable combat skills.
▶ 1 minigame to earn money

Overview

Machines have taken over the world and cast a dark shadow over it. Yesterday's society, which was comfortable thanks to machines, has collapsed due to apostate machines. You must correct this. You have a lot of potential, so you have to constantly challenge yourself to move forward.
